sentence.Network_en: And I think the tenderness is their primary Mozartian quality.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想,柔和就是它们最基本的莫扎特品质.

sentence.Network_en: The first Mozartian opera to be subjected to this curious treatment ran dispiritedly for five performances.
sentence.Network_cn: 注定会遭受此种吹毛求疵的批评的第一部莫扎特歌剧毫无生气地上演了五次.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or in the manner of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
